title: Working with .NET and Apache Cassandra/DataStax Enterprise
description: Getting a C# .NET *core* application started to work against an Apache Cassandra (or DataStax Enterprise) Database. Starting from complete scratch with installation and all the steps. I wrap up with getting a status from the server that we've connected to a keyspace. Next steps... for the next "C# hour"! -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxacademy
